meanings.definition: A type of seaweed that grows on rocks.
meanings.sent1: The rockweeds swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: The divers observed the rockweeds clinging to the underwater rocks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull tried to use the rockweeds as a disguise.
meanings.sent4: The rockweeds formed a lush green carpet on the rocky shore.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the vibrant colors of the rockweeds.

meanings.sent1: We collected a bucket full of rockweeds from the tide pools.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in beautiful rockweeds of various shades.
meanings.sent3: The rockweeds whispered secrets to each other in the ocean breeze.
meanings.sent4: The rockweeds danced gracefully with the waves, like a silent ballet.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen used the rockweeds as bait to catch fish.
